ygData.subject: RE: Neriak Faction
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks to The Shadow for this idea of grouping, just tried it and unfortunately it did not work as Mark Rafn indicated :-( Next, upon becoming sober again, I
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks to The Shadow for this idea of grouping, just tried it and
unfortunately it did not work as Mark Rafn indicated :-(

Next, upon becoming sober again, I will try the invis thing. Who knows, it
may just work :-)

(yes, I drowned my sorrow in 15 cases of Ol'Tujim's Fierce Brew... whew that
stuff is strong, but alcohol tolerance up to 90 now :-)

Thanks for the help, all!

- Xinuilt

-----Original Message-----
From: Mark Rafn [mailto:dagon@...]
Sent: Tuesday, February 22, 2000 5:59 PM
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Neriak Faction


From: Mark Rafn <dagon@...>

On Tue, 22 Feb 2000, The Shadow wrote:

> This may work...its from the ranger list a long time ago.....but group
> with someone and have them hand in items that effect the bargainers
> faction...just stand very close to them...and as long as you are not
> KOS you will find out if this still works....even if you just get a
> newbie to do it if they get xp and you don't i think it is a good
> tradeoff...just my 2 cents and hope it still works..

Don't think so. Quest experience is shared among the group, but quest
faction no longer is.

I wonder if call of bones resets your faction to base skeleton faction.
But even if it does, that won't help a DE that has destroyed his faction
(for the same reason shared wolf form didn't work - illusions only change
your base racial faction, not religion-based faction changes or
adjustments due to kills or quests).

I couldn't find any reference to another way to increase dark bargainer
faction. Rumor has it that some quests can be done invis - you might try
giving 4 stacks of 4 red wines while invis, the re-casting and repeating.

Or you may be SOL. Perhaps it's time to start cultivating freeport
faction.
--
Mark Rafn dagon@... < http://www.dagon.net/
<http://www.dagon.net/> > !G
